zhcn_desc:
§E§H矿物§!（£minerals£）是对用于建造舰船、太空站、星际建筑的各种基础材料的统称。你可以通过以下的方式获取更多的矿物：
§Y1.§!在殖民星球上建设§H采矿区划§!。
§Y2.§!在富含矿物的星球上使用§H工程船§!建设§H开采站§!。
§Y3.§!在§H贸易市场§!添购矿物。§!
en_desc:
§E§HMinerals§! (£minerals£) is a collective term for the basic resources we need to construct ships, stations and planetary buildings. We can gain more by:
§Y1.§! Building §HMining Districts§! on the surface of colonized planets.
§Y2.§! Using §HConstruction Ships§! to build §HMining Stations§! around mineral rich planets or asteroids.
§Y3.§! Buying more on the §HMarket§!.§!
